question: What are the names of projects starting before 2022?
raw_answer: Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs, Latigo Canyon Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements (FEMA/CalOES Project), Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs (FEMA/CalOES Project)
evidence_answer: Latigo Canyon Road Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements, Trancas Canyon Park Planting and Irrigation Repairs, Disaster Projects (Design) Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs
extracted_search_list: Latigo Canyon Roadway/Retaining Wall Improvements (FEMA/CalOES Project)

Broad Beach Road Water Quality Infrastructure Repairs
